author: abcoathup
content: This isn't the place for recruiting or for promoting your project.  Please remove and post elsewhere.

author: carinaaaaaa0
content: Thanks for the feedback. Just to clarify — this wasn’t intended as promotion. I didn’t even include official website link or ask for signups. I genuinely thought that some members here might find value in co-creating around decentralized evaluation systems, especially since it aligns with the ethos of Ethereum. I’m sorry if it disturbed anyone who wasn’t interested. I’ll be more mindful going forward.
